reviewText:
What a great all-around movie!  The south IS the wakeboarding scene, and this film is right there in the middle of it.  Many of the local riders here ARE the same pros you see in other films, so the action in LE is abundant.  I'm not into wakeskating at all, but, if you are, there is plenty to see.  Also, the editing and effects are top notch.
Great job on this film!  Buy it... you will not be disappointed!
I really liked this film! I'm not a wakeboarder, but I loved the photography, and the editing was perfect with the fast paced soundtrack! Great job!

I was really disappointed with this DVD.  The camera angles are horrible (half the dvd looks like it was filmed by some guy standing on the shore), the music is worse (some local band the whole movie!?) and the tricks aren't anything special.  At one point it looked like they had filmed it with a cell phone camera.

This video is outstanding! Liquid Equilibrium covers many south eastern states with footage of riders from all levels of experience. From back yard rail contests to rails of fire it will keep you wanting more.

The creativity in this video is soooo unique! I was entranced. I loved the fade-ins/outs.
Awesome action captures!

Liquid Equilibrium is an awesome video for both the veteran wakeboarder and those new to the sport. Packed with fast moving tricks and fast-paced music, this is one DVD that you will watch again and again.

Great video all around, well produced and well scored.  They have really captured the feel and essence of grass roots wake-skating, I could almost taste the water.  Will be telling all my friends about this one!
Fantastic footage of riders. Great mix of wakeboarding tricks and wakeskating. If you are into wakeboarding... you do not want to miss out on seeing this video.
